name: @d2l/env-or
description: Interface for process.env variables that allows setting a default value if none is set

scripts.test: npm run check-style && npm run test-no-style
scripts.test-no-style: export NODE_ENV=test; istanbul cover --dir ./coverage --root src/ node_modules/.bin/_mocha ./test || node_modules/.bin/mocha -R spec ./test

author: D2L Corporation
